thread.title: Two killed in Burundi clashes
thread.title_full: Two killed in Burundi clashes | News24

author: news24.com
title: Two killed in Burundi clashes
text:
Nairobi - Burundi troops have killed two people in separate clashes in recent days, the army said on Wednesday, the latest unrest following the president's controversial re-election.
Army spokesperson Gaspard Baratuza said that "unidentified criminals" had staged attacks on military posts, including on Tuesday night, when one gunman was killed in the rural district of Buringa about 8km southeast of the capital Bujumbura.
Tensions remain high following President Pierre Nkurunziza's successful bid for a third term in power in July.
Gunmen also attacked a military post in Gihanga, about 15km northeast of Bujumbura overnight on Sunday.
